concept.title: Lisp Debugger
concept.shortdesc: Activated by command VLIDE or VLISP, Lisp Debugger is used to debug lisp programs. Developed based on Visual Studio Code from Microsoft™, it enables developers to debug their lisp programs with breakpoint inspection and modify it easily.

conbody.p: What’s more, if users have already installed the Visual Studio Code, they can directly download ZwLisp in Microsoft Extensions Marketplace.
